posts.title: Creation of the department of Philosophical and Social Sciences KNTEU
posts.body:
The Department of Philosophy and Social Sciences (Head of the Department - Doctor of Political Sciences, Professor N. A. Latigin) was established in 1966.

In the 2016/2017 academic year, the department provides teaching of 28 disciplines, including normative humanitarian disciplines; discipline on the choice of students; discipline for postgraduate students and graduate students.
